title: Recall & Confidence
summary: Strengthen response to your call and build trust in crate time.

lessons.title: Recall 1
lessons.objective: Teach puppy to come when called.
steps: Call puppy’s name + cue ('Come!') once in cheerful tone.
Run backwards a step; reward on arrival.
supportGuidelines: If puppy ignores: use higher-value treat, shorter distance.
lessons.safetyNotes: Never call for punishment; make recalls fun.

lessons.title: Trade Game
lessons.objective: Teach puppy to release items willingly.
steps: Say 'Trade' and offer treat near toy.
When puppy releases toy, mark and treat; give toy back.
supportGuidelines: Use valuable treat to build trust.

lessons.title: Crate Love 2
lessons.objective: Close crate door briefly; reward calm behaviour.
steps: Feed puppy in crate; gently close door for a few seconds.
supportGuidelines: If whining: shorten time; avoid releasing mid-cry.
